item.title: Tierney add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Everyone has talent. What's rare is the courage to follow it to the dark places where it leads." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "And the trouble is, if you don't risk anything, you risk even more." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Nothing quite has reality for me till I write it all down--revising and embellishing as I go. I'm always waiting for things to be over so I can get home and commit them to paper." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Advice is what we ask for when we already know the answer but wish we didnâ€™t." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "My reaction to porno films is as follows: After the first ten minutes, I want to go home and screw. After the first twenty minutes, I never want to screw again as long as I live." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I feel that life is divided into the horrible and the miserable. That's the two categories. The horrible are like, I don't know, terminal cases, you know, and blind people, crippled. I don't know how they get through life. It's amazing to me. And the miserable is everyone else. So you should be thankful that you're miserable, because that's very lucky, to be miserable." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "My one regret in life is that I am not someone else." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I was nauseous and tingly all over. I was either in love or I had smallpox." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Tierney add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "I understood that as much as I had resisted the outside, as much as I had constricted my life, as much as I had closed and narrowed the channels into me, there were still many takers for the quiet heart." -- Steve Martin
